name: Aelar
fact: You once tried to make friends with a badger, but it didn't go very well...
fact2: You can bench press two dwarves.
fact3: You have never been told where meat comes from and would be deeply saddened if anyone dared tell you.

name: Biri
fact: You have a fake treasure map that you believe leads to real treasure.
fact2: You believe you are a skeleton that is in control of a meat suit.
fact3: No matter how hard you try, you will never be able to whistle.

name: Ellywick
fact2: You collect flowers and press them into tiny glass frames.
fact3: You collect shiny rocks that you like from the ground.

name: Liftrasa
fact: You are obsessed with the feeling of cotton.
fact2: You can solve a Rubik’s cube in under 2 minutes - blindfolded.
fact3: You always carry a small plant in a glass bottle.
